This is the direction script call.
The direction is 0, which will fire the direction the player faces.
- Nothing is before | because this shot will not have a player effect.
- after the | will run common event 1 and erase the event it hits
The projectile will stop on region 1 (painted on the fence in this demo)
Quick projectile 3 is set to target 'm', which means the mouse position
It also is an example of using an animated projectile sprite
This projectile is set with projectile id of 666
